articles.content:
CLUBS have gained a mini-victory, with permission from the AFL to increase the head count in their off-field football staff.
As of June 1, 27 staff will be allowed in each club's football department… [+1907 chars]

articles.author: Sam Phillips
articles.title: No endless rivers of rugby gold in Japan for fresh wave of Australian exports - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: A pair of Japanese Top League coaches have warned there are no rivers of gold for Australian rugby players looking to flee Super Rugby.
articles.content:
The Top League has been one of the few top competitions in world sport that has been unaffected by the coronavirus pandemic, as their season does not start until January.
That has led to speculation… [+2736 chars]
